subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mark Foster shot a three-under 68 on Saturday to share a one-stroke lead with James Morrison after the third round at the French Open in St.-Quentin-en-Yvelines.
snippet: Mark Foster shot a three-under 68 on Saturday to share a one-stroke lead with James Morrison after the third round at the French Open in St.-Quentin-en-Yvelines.
